name: Phantom Bros
description:
In this epic boss battle, each successful hit spawns a phantom who can help you take down the boss. Gather up to 5 to maximize your impact.  Be warned, a hit from the boss will destroy them all. 

Controls

WASD -  movement

F - toggle targeting on/off

E - Block

Mouse movement - Camera control

Mouse Scroll Wheel - Zoom

1  - Red Potion - Health

2  - Blue Potion - Strength

ESC - Pause Menu

Pleas enjoy our first ever game jam submission. This was created by three friends in a week.  Nearly all  the content is original including those amazing swords!  The in game song is an original song but the main menu song comes from bensound.
